channel.title: [Pi] Login Issue Update
channel.description:
So i still havent been able to fix this. After i restart the server it runs for a while but then just glitches, players get the account is already logged in error.. When they make a new acc it dc's them instant..
Also one of my players has sent me this report today : I got disconnected, as usual. But right before getting dc'ed, I noticed an ingame PM, from "Map{numbershere}", and the message was something like "Hihihi8927363-"$"#_'^¨%$%£µ%£###~3847./.?/£µ%..."

I can’t find the problem… There is no error in eclipse, the server works perfect on start…

So i still havent been able to fix this. After i restart the server it runs for a while but then just glitches, players get the account is already logged in error… When they make a new acc it dc’s them instant…

Also one of my players has sent me this report today :
